list.title: TodoController#create
list.description: Create a new todo item. Handler for POST /todos.

list.title: TodoController#delete
list.description: Delete a todo item by id. Handler for DELETE /todos/:id.

list.title: TodoController#findAll
list.description: Find all todo items. Handler for GET /todos.

list.title: TodoController#findOne
list.description: Find a todo item by id. Handler for GET /todos/:id.

list.title: TodoController#update
list.description: Update a todo item by id. Handler for PUT /todos/:id.

list.title: module:controllers.TodoController
list.description: TodoController class for handling HTTP requests related to the todo resource.

list.title: randomInt
list.description: Returns a random integer between the specified values.

list.title: todoErrorHandler
list.description: Handle general errors from the todo router.
